name: Semgrep
description: Static analysis tool for finding security vulnerabilities across 30+ languages with 5000+ rules

tools: scan — Run Semgrep scan on code/repository

setup_steps: 1. Install: pip install semgrep (or use uvx for MCP)
2. For Semgrep Cloud: Create API token at semgrep.dev/settings/tokens
3. For OSS: No token needed — community rules available without auth
4. Set SEMGREP_APP_TOKEN for cloud platform features
security_notes: Semgrep runs locally — code never leaves your machine (OSS mode)
Cloud token only needed for Semgrep Platform features (policies, dashboards)
Token scopes: read-only on findings is sufficient for MCP use
